questions.question: Type of spark-gaps preferred in impulse current generation are-

answers.a: a resistive shunt of few KOhm and a sensing device that should be capable of measuring the signal of small frequency band
answers.b: a resistive shunt range from 10 micro Ohm to few m? and a sensing device that should be capable of measuring the signal of low frequency band
answers.c: a resistive shunt range from 10 micro Ohm to few m? and a sensing device that should be capable of measuring the signal over a high frequency band
